original_text:
Cast but a glance at riches, and they are gone,
    for they will surely sprout wings
    and fly off to the sky like an eagle.
korean_text: 네가 어찌 허무한 것에 주목하겠느냐 정녕히 재물은 스스로 날개를 내어 하늘을 나는 독수리처럼 날아가리라

sentences.original_text: Cast but a glance at riches
for they will surely sprout wings
and fly off to the sky like an eagle
